remixlab.dandelion.core

Class InteractiveAvatarFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.dandelion.core.Frame
      • remixlab.dandelion.core.InteractiveFrame
        • remixlab.dandelion.core.InteractiveAvatarFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Grabber, Constants, Trackable, Copyable

    public class InteractiveAvatarFrame
extends InteractiveFrame
implements Trackable, Copyable
    The InteractiveAvatarFrame class represents an InteractiveFrame that can be tracked by an Eye, i.e., it implements the Trackable interface.

    The eyeFrame() of the camera that is to be tracking the frame (see the documentation of the Trackable interface) is defined in spherical coordinates (azimuth(), inclination() and trackingDistance()) respect to the Frame.position() (which defines the Eye.at() Vec).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InteractiveAvatarFrame(AbstractScene scn)
      Constructs an InteractiveAvatarFrame and sets its trackingDistance() to AbstractScene.radius()/5, azimuth() to 0, and inclination() to 0.
